description.zh: Beifong 是一个个性化的信息与播客生成系统，可从可信来源（包括文章和社交媒体平台）收集内容。它利用人工智能分析、总结并将精选内容自动转化为音频播客，支持脚本和语音的自动生成。该平台支持自定义内容处理器、基于浏览器的数据采集以及 Slack 等集成，实现无缝交互。
description.en: Beifong is a personalized information and podcast generation system that curates content from trusted sources, including articles and social media platforms. It leverages AI to analyze, summarize, and transform curated content into audio podcasts with automated script and voice generation. The platform supports custom content processors, browser-based data collection, and integrations like Slack for seamless interaction.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 将用户信任的在线内容自动转化为个性化的音频播客
- 仅聚焦用户自主筛选的信息源，消除信息噪音
- 通过AI生成的音频摘要实现免动手知识获取
- 高度可扩展，支持自定义处理器和第三方工具集成

## 功能列表:

- 基于AI的内容分析与摘要
- 自动播客脚本生成
- 支持OpenAI、ElevenLabs及开源引擎（如Kokoro）的文本转语音
- 基于浏览器自动化的社交媒体数据采集（X.com、Facebook等）
- 使用FAISS向量索引的语义搜索
- 通过Python模块扩展自定义内容处理器
- 可调度的内容采集与处理工作流
- Slack集成以实现对话式AI交互
- 持久化浏览器会话用于登录站点访问
- 支持本地及远程部署，基于Redis与Python后端
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Turns your trusted online content into personalized audio podcasts automatically
- Eliminates information noise by focusing only on user-curated sources
- Enables hands-free knowledge consumption through AI-generated audio summaries
- Highly extensible with support for custom processors and third-party tools

## Features:

- AI-powered content analysis and summarization
- Automated podcast script generation
- Text-to-speech support via OpenAI, ElevenLabs, and open-source engines (e.g., Kokoro)
- Browser automation for social media data collection (X.com, Facebook, etc.)
- Semantic search using FAISS vector indexing
- Custom content processor extensibility via Python modules
- Scheduled content collection and processing workflows
- Slack integration for conversational AI interaction
- Persistent browser sessions for authenticated site access
- Local and remote deployment options with Redis and Python backend
